api_data.job_title: Opening For Inside Sales (Female Only) - For New Friends Colony

jd_information.description: Job ResponsibilityIdentify correct prospect according to the eligibility standards & convert into a sale.Establish and maintain current client and potential client relationships.Regular follow up on enquiries received.Identify, resolve queries & handling objections of clients.Maximum achievement of goals and service levels.Effective pipeline management.Able to achieve monthly target.Any added responsibility assigned by Superiors to enhance more ability.Desired Candidate ProfileExcellent Communication, Convincing & Analytics Skills.Ability to demonstrate in a professional and courteous manner.Strong Selling & negotiation skills.Sales focused, result orientated & able to work under pressure.Pleasing Personality.
